attributes.additional_details: A door supervisors wages 10+ years ago was £10 per hour and today you'll be lucky enough to get £10 per hour but it ranges from £7.50-£10 per hour! This needs to change to a minimum of £15 per hour. To be working for a extra £2.50 above the national minimum wage to have to deal with what they do is disgusting!
attributes.background: The role of a door supervisor is to protect the people that want to go out for a good time and to deal with challenging situations. A door supervisor of today are putting their lives at risk by having to deal with concealed weapons, broken bottles used as weapons and a lot more!

rejection.details: This is a decision for employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
